definition: an arrangement of aerials spaced to give desired directional characteristics, to lay out orderly or logically in a line or as if in a line
details:
noun
- an arrangement of aerials spaced to give desired directional characteristics
- especially fine or decorative clothing
= synonyms: raiment, regalia
- an impressive display
= example: an impressive display
- an orderly arrangement
= example: an orderly arrangement
verb
- to lay out orderly or logically in a line or as if in a line
= example: to lay out orderly or logically in a line or as if in a line
= synonyms: range, set out, lay out
